description: Shrine-hopping adventure through Tokyo for goshuin collection, then departing for Mount Fuji area. Multiple beautiful shrines in Harajuku/Shibuya area before traveling to Kawaguchiko for ryokan stay.

activities.description: Drop off bags in coin locker or luggage storage at Shinjuku Station
Lunch in Harajuku/Shibuya - explore Omotesando, Cat Street, or backstreets of Harajuku
Arrive at Shinjuku Station and retrieve your luggage

travelRoutes.name: Ebisu to Shinjuku Station
travelRoutes.description: Morning journey from Shibuya accommodation area to Shinjuku for shrine hopping departure

meals: Breakfast: Light meal before departure, Lunch: Harajuku/Omotesando restaurants, Dinner: Traditional ryokan kaiseki
